__e: You're here because they think, after I help stop the bomb, Jack will try to kill me.
I just said that because I don't want him to kill me when I get home.
Look, Charlie, I just finished talking to my brother and he said he's going to have us both killed if we keep seeing each other.
But what doesn't kill us makes us stronger, right?
What doesn't kill you makes you stronger.
That's why people love to say that what doesn't kill you makes you stronger.
